definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Because of her strange clothing, she didn’t fit in well with the rest of the students.
sentences.chinese: 因为她喜欢穿奇装异服，所以她跟其他同学合不来。

sentences.english: His weird clothes really gas me.
sentences.chinese: 他的奇装异服真使我笑死了。

sentences.english: A lot vintage shops and a lot quirkily dressed people, a lot young people.
sentences.chinese: 大量的复古店和许多穿着奇装异服的人，很多年轻人。

sentences.english: Weird clothes and hairstyles are so popular in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 奇装异服和怪异的发型在日本是很常见的。

sentences.english: Because of her strange clothing, she didn't fit in well with the rest of the students.
sentences.chinese: 因为她喜欢穿奇装异服，所以她跟其他同学合不来。

sentences.english: Looking at the strange clothes they were wearing, he frowned.
sentences.chinese: 看他们穿着奇装异服，他皱起了眉头。

sentences.english: He frowned when he saw their wear strange clothes.
sentences.chinese: 看他们穿着奇装异服，他皱起了眉头。

sentences.english: He frowns at their bizarre attire.
sentences.chinese: 看他们穿着奇装异服，他皱起了眉头。

sentences.english: There are quite some people swaggering through the streets in outlandish clothes.
sentences.chinese: 穿着奇装异服招摇过市的大有人在。

sentences.english: He rivel his eyebrow when he see they wearing odd clothing.
sentences.chinese: 看他们穿着奇装异服，他皱起了眉头。

definition: to decorate/to dress/to make up/to adorn/manner of dressing/style of dress
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom)/dressed to the nines and wearing makeup
to parade oneself ostentatiously about town (idiom)
lit. lovely scene of blossoming plants swaying in the breeze (idiom)/fig. gorgeously dressed (woman)
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner
